code:
graph TB
  subgraph PerformanceBenchmarks[FinTech_LedgerService]
    subgraph LatencyBenchmarks[FinTech_LedgerService]
      subgraph TransactionLatencyBench[FinTech_FraudDetection]
        TransTarget[FinTech_TransactionQueue]
        TransActual[FinTech_TransactionQueue]
        TransImprovement[FinTech_TransactionQueue]

        TransTarget --> TransActual
        TransActual --> TransImprovement
      end

      subgraph ConsolidationLatencyBench[FinTech_PaymentGateway]
        ConsTarget[FinTech_AuthVault]
        ConsActual[FinTech_FraudDetection]
        ConsImprovement[FinTech_TransactionQueue]

        ConsTarget --> ConsActual
        ConsActual --> ConsImprovement
      end
    end

    subgraph AvailabilityBenchmarks[FinTech_FraudDetection]
      subgraph TransactionAvailabilityBench[FinTech_AuthVault]
        TransAvailTarget[FinTech_FraudDetection]
        TransAvailActual[FinTech_FraudDetection]
        TransAvailImprovement[FinTech_FraudDetection]

        TransAvailTarget --> TransAvailActual
        TransAvailActual --> TransAvailImprovement
      end

      subgraph ErrorRateBench[FinTech_FraudDetection]
        ErrorRateTarget[FinTech_AuthVault]
        ErrorRateActual[FinTech_PaymentGateway]
        ErrorRateImprovement[FinTech_PaymentGateway]

        ErrorRateTarget --> ErrorRateActual
        ErrorRateActual --> ErrorRateImprovement
      end
    end

    subgraph ConsistencyBenchmarks[FinTech_TransactionQueue]
      subgraph EventualConsistencyBench[FinTech_LedgerService]
        EventualTarget[FinTech_LedgerService]
        EventualActual[FinTech_TransactionQueue]
        EventualImprovement[FinTech_TransactionQueue]

        EventualTarget --> EventualActual
        EventualActual --> EventualImprovement
      end

      subgraph ConvergenceTimeBench[FinTech_AuthVault]
        ConvergenceTarget[FinTech_FraudDetection]
        ConvergenceActual[FinTech_LedgerService]
        ConvergenceImprovement[FinTech_PaymentGateway]

        ConvergenceTarget --> ConvergenceActual
        ConvergenceActual --> ConvergenceImprovement
      end
    end

    subgraph ArchitecturalBenchmarks[FinTech_LedgerService]
      subgraph IndependenceBench[FinTech_AuthVault]
        IndependenceTarget[FinTech_FraudDetection]
        IndependenceActual[FinTech_PaymentGateway]
        IndependenceImprovement[FinTech_TransactionQueue]

        IndependenceTarget --> IndependenceActual
        IndependenceActual --> IndependenceImprovement
      end

      subgraph ScalabilityBench[FinTech_LedgerService]
        ScalabilityTarget[FinTech_FraudDetection]
        ScalabilityActual[FinTech_LedgerService]
        ScalabilityImprovement[FinTech_AuthVault]

        ScalabilityTarget --> ScalabilityActual
        ScalabilityActual --> ScalabilityImprovement
      end
    end

    subgraph ThroughputBenchmarks[FinTech_FraudDetection]
      subgraph RequestThroughput[FinTech_FraudDetection]
        ThroughputComparison[FinTech_LedgerService]
      end

      subgraph LoadHandling[FinTech_PaymentGateway]
        LoadCapability[FinTech_AuthVault]
      end
    end

    subgraph ResourceEfficiency[FinTech_AuthVault]
      subgraph NetworkEfficiency[FinTech_PaymentGateway]
        NetworkUsage[FinTech_PaymentGateway]
      end

      subgraph ComputeEfficiency[FinTech_AuthVault]
        VirtualUserScaling[FinTech_AuthVault]
      end
    end
  end

  subgraph BenchmarkSummary[FinTech_FraudDetection]
    subgraph OverallRating[FinTech_FraudDetection]
      ExcellentRating[FinTech_TransactionQueue]
    end

    subgraph KeyAchievements[FinTech_FraudDetection]
      SubSecondLatency[FinTech_AuthVault]

      PerfectReliability[FinTech_FraudDetection]

      DataIntegrity[FinTech_LedgerService]

      ArchitecturalSoundness[FinTech_PaymentGateway]
    end
  end

  %% Relationships
  TransImprovement --> ExcellentRating
  ConsImprovement --> ExcellentRating
  ErrorRateImprovement --> PerfectReliability
  IndependenceImprovement --> ArchitecturalSoundness
  EventualImprovement --> DataIntegrity

  %% Styling
  classDef target fill:#fff3e0,stroke:#f57c00,stroke-width:2px
  classDef actual fill:#e8f5e8,stroke:#4caf50,stroke-width:3px
  classDef improvement fill:#e3f2fd,stroke:#1976d2,stroke-width:2px
  classDef excellent fill:#e8f5e8,stroke:#388e3c,stroke-width:4px
  classDef achievement fill:#f3e5f5,stroke:#7b1fa2,stroke-width:3px

  class TransTarget,ConsTarget,TransAvailTarget,ErrorRateTarget,EventualTarget,ConvergenceTarget,IndependenceTarget,ScalabilityTarget target
  class TransActual,ConsActual,TransAvailActual,ErrorRateActual,EventualActual,ConvergenceActual,IndependenceActual,ScalabilityActual actual
  class TransImprovement,ConsImprovement,TransAvailImprovement,ErrorRateImprovement,EventualImprovement,ConvergenceImprovement,IndependenceImprovement,ScalabilityImprovement improvement
  class ExcellentRating excellent
  class SubSecondLatency,PerfectReliability,DataIntegrity,ArchitecturalSoundness achievement
